name: Scyl of the Drakes

skills.name: Drake's Swiftness
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% Decrease SPD debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 30% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 15%.

effects.notes: Single hit. 20% chance Decrease SPD, 30% chance Decrease TM.

skills.book_value: Valuable: increased damage and proc chance when booked; A1 is considered useful for TM control.
skills.notes: Good anti-turn-meter tool vs bosses that rely on single big turns.

skills.name: Wingbeat Flurry
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a Stun debuff for 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE, 3 hits. 20% chance Stun per hit. Multi-hit benefits from Giant Slayer.
20% chance per hit to place Stun for 1 turn. Books to 30% chance.

skills.book_value: High: booking improves proc rates (+10% Stun chance to 30%) and reduces cooldown (-1 turn); core CC ability.
skills.notes: Strong crowd-control A2; synergises with ACC and stun-focused masteries/sets. 3 hits benefit from Giant Slayer mastery.

skills.name: Phoenix Rite
skills.description: Revives an ally with 50% HP and places a 50% Ally Protection buff on them for 2 turns.
skills.book_value: High: book to reduce cooldown and increase usability in long fights.
skills.notes: Excellent emergency tool; ally protection reduces immediate follow-up wipes.

skills.name: Boundless Life
skills.description: Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of each turn. Also places a 30% Increase SPD buff on a random ally for 2 turns.
skills.notes: Extremely powerful passive for sustain and team speed; benefits greatly from Relentless/extra-turn sets.

general: - GIANT SLAYER: A2 is 3-hit AoE attack → 3 chances per enemy for 30% proc (better than Warmaster for multi-hit)
- Lay on Hands + Healing Savior + Merciful Aid: Stack healing boost masteries (passive heals 10% MAX HP per turn)
- Eagle Eye + Pinpoint Accuracy: A2 Stun and A1 Decrease SPD require ACC
- Unshakeable: Reviver/healer needs RES to avoid disruption
- Life Drinker: Sustain synergy with DEF-scaling damage
- Lore of Steel: Boosts Speed/Perception set bonuses
SUPPORT ROLE: Primary healer/reviver - prioritize Support tree for heal boost and ACC/RES

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use revive, heal, and stun appropriately. Relentless set can cause extra turns for more healing.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion, but enables sustain and revive strategies for progression content.

mechanics_advisory: Scyl of the Drakes is a top-tier support for progression, offering revive, healing, stun, and TM control. A2 3-hit AoE benefits from Giant Slayer. Passive healing (10% MAX HP per turn) scales with Lay on Hands/Healing Savior masteries. Excellent for Faction Wars, Doom Tower, and Dungeons. Build for ACC (Stun/Decrease SPD), SPD, and survivability (DEF/HP). Relentless set maximizes healing uptime.
